statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Alice has n points in two-dimensional plane. She wants to know how many different acute triangles they can form. Two triangles are considered different if they differ in at least one point.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The input contains multiple test cases.
For each test case, begin with an integer n,
next n lines each contains two integers $x_{i}$ and $y_{i}$.
$3 \leq n \leq 2000$
$0 \leq x_{i},y_{i} \leq 1e9$
Any two points will not coincide.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case output a line contains an integer.
